title: A teeny bit of help.

replies.body:
Seems like you're paying a lot extra for the looks and light weightness. 
 
If you really want a laptop get one that isn't advertised as "light weight", those ones make you pay extra for things that are really cosmetic for the most part.
All in all a desktop PC is much better all round ^_^
